sentences.en: a ready supply of drink
sentences.cn: 现成的饮料供应

sentences.en: an intelligent man with a ready wit
sentences.cn: 一个头脑机敏的聪明男人

sentences.en: Catherine was ready to explode. "I think you're contemptible!"
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳气得快要炸了。“我觉得你真是可鄙！”

sentences.en: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.cn: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.en: Do not toss the salad until you're ready to serve.
sentences.cn: 到快上菜时再轻轻搅拌色拉。

sentences.en: He edged closer to the telephone, ready to grab it.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢挪向电话机，准备抓起听筒。

sentences.en: He says it's like a volcano ready to erupt.
sentences.cn: 他说这就像一座即将喷发的火山。

sentences.en: He's always ready to help his friends.
sentences.cn: 他总是乐意帮助朋友。

sentences.en: I had no ready answer to his question.
sentences.cn: 他的问题我一时想不出答案。

sentences.en: Many struggling firms are ready to break the law by dodging tax.
sentences.cn: 很多挣扎求生的企业不惜违法逃税。

sentences.en: Only after countless rewrites did John consider the script ready.
sentences.cn: 只有经过了无数次修改后，约翰才认为剧本写好了。

sentences.en: Prepare the garnishes shortly before you are ready to serve the soup.
sentences.cn: 在快要准备上汤前再在上面加点装饰菜。

sentences.en: Problems will crop up and hit you before you are ready.
sentences.cn: 你还未准备好，问题就会突然出现并打击你。

sentences.en: She was ready and willing to work hard.
sentences.cn: 她工作积极肯干。

sentences.en: Soldiers came charging through the forest, guns at the ready.
sentences.cn: 荷枪实弹的士兵穿过林区冲了上来。

sentences.en: soldiers with machine guns at the ready; students with notebooks at the ready.
sentences.cn: 配备有机枪的士兵们；准备好笔记本的学生们

sentences.en: Tamsin materialized at her side, notebook at the ready.
sentences.cn: 塔姆辛从她身旁冒了出来，且备好了笔记本。

sentences.en: The enemy must be digging themselves in now ready for the attack.
sentences.cn: 敌人现在一定在挖掩体，准备迎接进攻。

sentences.en: The Night Duty Officer was ready to clock off.
sentences.cn: 值夜班的警员准备打卡下班。

sentences.en: The ship will not be ready for a month.
sentences.cn: 船1个月内还不能交付使用。

sentences.en: They need to have ready access to police files.
sentences.cn: 他们需要立即能查到警方的档案。

sentences.en: They sell materials for DIY mosaics and ready-made panels.
sentences.cn: 他们出售自己动手做镶嵌画所需材料和现成的镶板。

sentences.en: They were ready to die for their beliefs.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意为信仰而献身。

sentences.en: When the clay feels like putty, it is ready to use.
sentences.cn: 黏土摸起来像油灰时，就可以用了。

sentences.en: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.cn: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.en: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.cn: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

words.tran_cn: 容易地；乐意地；无困难地
敏捷，迅速；准备就绪；愿意

phrases.tran_cn: 可立即使用的：立即可以投入使用的
准备动身，预备启程；整装待发
现成的；预先制好的；无创意的
即食食品；速煮食品；方便食品
《我们准备好了》（北京奥运会一周年倒计时主题歌）

trans.tran_cn: 准备好的，现成的，马上要，急需，乐意的，聪明的
trans.tran_en: if you are ready, you are prepared for what you are going to do
money that you can use immediately
if you are ready, you are prepared for what you are going to do
to make something or someone ready for something
